mapper.update: update promotion_plans set status = #{status} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT pp.id, pp.title, pp.content, pp.budget, pp.feedback, pp.create_time, pp.update_time, ps.plan_status_name, s.username as submitter_name, a.username as approver_name FROM promotion_plans pp LEFT JOIN plan_status ps ON pp.status = ps.plan_id LEFT JOIN employees s ON pp.submitter_id = s.id LEFT JOIN employees a ON pp.approver_id = a.id WHERE pp.status = 0;
